text: The app in all is great. The star deducted is for the notifications. The notification system of this app is really poor. While contacting for support via chat the chat screen has to be kept open till the time ur issue isn't resolved else there are no notifications when a message has been sent from the executive. Multiple issues have been closed without a resolution due to this. There have been no changes to the device notifications from my end. A kind request to please fix this.

Really good and user friendly.. I have been using it from past 4 months. You may need to work on order calendar to see month orders at one go. And, out of stock to be notified before clicking " add" Inspite these two issues, I recommended this app to many friends to get milk, vegetables and fruits at doorstep..

Wonderful experience! In these difficult days it helped us alot to stay safe at home. Fresh items always. Me and my husband are blind persons. The app is not fully assessible. We hope to a more assessible #SUPRDaily!!! I recommended the app to my so many blind friends. But they are not happy as the app is not accessible. We cannot scroll to the main menu with screen readers. That's why I decrease my rating. Please follow the accessibility guidelines and make it correct with screen reader softwar

Excellent app working just as per my thought ideas... Thought of updating as I used it for almost a month now... It would be great to have; 1. the whole month calendar shown when touched on any of those 7 days shown on home screen 2. The calendar would show all the days to b delivered in that month which was subscribed or scheduled for one of items 3. When touched on a particular date, then it would show details like what it shows up now but not one below on scroll basibut just for that date

Poor service. They never deliver the products even with subscription. The money refunded goes to their stupid wallet instead of bank account. So you are stuck forever or lose your money. Customer care is another pain point as they just give you bookish response and no resolution at all apart from refund to wallet. This app should just be removed.

Good app. Suggestions.... quality of bread is very poor.milk...very good.. fruits reasonable... there should be space to write review of the particular item. This will bring more transparency. Please show only the items which are available. ... what's a point in exhibiting the items which are not existing.

The app was working just fine till now, but all of a sudden the app is not opening, I have updated it, reinstalled it, notinh seems to work. The prices are gone up, its not proving to be as useful as it was before. Can you please resolve the issue here because I have some of the ammot already in the wallet and I wish to use it.

This app experience for me is worst i availed milk service through this app, but when you face product deliver issue they will not update by themself in the app. you have to chase your money through there support chat by raising deliver concern and following up for refund. They will say wait till 9am after 9 am time passes then again you have to follow up through chat support and then through call after so much you to follow up and waste time then you will get refund in app wallet.

The app is great but certain services that were provided before have stopped You even have super coin for every order or subscription, but recently it all has stopped, haven't got any coins since two months On top you also have added service charge for every thing.Thought it is a very small amount to pay, but you dint a few months back provided every thing without any service charge. And I clearly remember that app introducing itself saying all services are free, no delivery or service charges.

There are so many missing instances for me.everytime they will tell me it wont be repeated again, but they will repeat the same. After fully dependeing on this app for products like milk and veggies how can we bought them at the same time in the morning. Please respond quickly and do some alternatives to not to miss any orders. Chat box is not responding and call support telling like it takes 20 min to reachout. 🙃🙃🙃🙃🙃🙃

Though we loved the Service provided by SUPR , but App is very slow. It take couple of minutes to load the app and view the menu, place the order... I must say this is one of the most slowest app I have in my phone.. Coming to service, we appreciate it how SUPR has made its mark in delivering the basic products and groceries by the day break in this tough testing times.

There are two missing items instances in a week, I have to invest lots of time just to reach customer service. Chat system is definitely out of line it will always show that refund has been processed for missing items but it won't reflect to wallet. Received a call from delivery guy that missing items will be delivered in two hours and as usual there was no delivery and no response from customer team. You have to keep calling for petty products.

Very slow back dated milk packets delivering by changing dates , occupied 2.9 GB memory never saw mobile app taking this much of memory. There will be 2 different prices maintained for an item .This app not suitable for bulk orders as prices are more .They don't have warehouse system to track items , just they depend on local vendors to deliver items with marginal prices.Most of the items wont be available. Wallet money will be adjusted as and when they want.Very bad customer support

Really very great app.... So useful and delivery on time ...I m fully satisfied with tha app services.5 star for service of the app but app is not user friendly the updates are not proper ... My suggestion is to make more flexible and should be clear for the users.

Pathetic service ... They charge but don't deliver ... They keep on adding the balance back to wallet and earn the interest ... But don't deliver the services for which they charge ... They don't even care to update .. one needs to take out time and run after them for the update as they will only convey, the order will be delayed ... However the end.result is same .. Difficult to understand, wether they won't or they can't deliver ... The irony is they deliver to your neighbours but not your

I've registered a card which was reissued once and blocked once. Now I have the same card registered with three different cvv nos. The app does not have the option to delete previous cards which makes it difficult during the payment. Suggest that you should have a delete card option as well.

Stupid App !! Firstly it asks you to add money in wallet for doing any kind of transaction.. the moment you try to add money or add items in your cart.. they hv a pop up saying we are experiencing heavy traffic try again later. If you guys cant manage, even delivering milk, whats the point of doing so much marketing ???

Edit: After 3 months, same problem exists and has only gotten worse. I have to click "add to cart" to know if an item is in stock. It's preposterous user experience. Will quit as soon as bb daily starts delivering in my building (unless Supr fixes it, stops taking customers for granted) -- availability of items is displayed as available buy when i click on 'add to cart' they become out of stock. Super frustrating. Can you please show availability status in product list/search results directly?

Awesome Experience.Very user-friendly and flexible service. Helping with daily needs, during difficult time. However the app is not very responsive, adding or removing of item is very slow operation. Not sure if items are out stock why they are shown in inventory. Overall with some improvement it would be best experience for users

Have being trying to be a member for past 1+ months but everytime it's denied because of high request, in the Times of need if the requests are not accepted then why would anyone continue to use post the crisis. Please do take care of new requests as well specially in areas where there are only few apps that deliver.

Initially it was good but in recent past maximum of the items are not available and the worst part is there is notification about the undelivered product which in turn led me into a argument with the delivery personnel which was pointless but did not realise it than. It takes me more than any wasted time to connect with customer care. I need to update them which items are undelivered. If they are good with milk supply they should do that only rather than increasing their product line. WORST EXP.
Service is good. I'm satisfied.. but app has to be little more user friendly... And there not much coupons available... And super Acess has be applied across all the products/subscription....

Easy to use, good options like setting vacation and change subscription etc but they have so many inconsistencies in delivery. Last 12 days they have missed 4 times the milk delivery. Sometimes any Vegetable is not available we can understand but milk being the primary product and missed so many delivery. Also one more problem is they show so many out of stock item in app. Now a days they have stopped WhatsApp chat option and their in-house chat option is also not working.

We get expired products regularly. I have got expired products almost 4 times now and I had to send the photos everytime via chat. In the chat they apologize and tell us that next time it won't happen. In the background no checks are made and expired products are delivered to customers and probably thats their goal. I dont think any checks are made before shipping daily items. So don't order anything except milk from this app.

I am a regular customer to this app upto today ....but from last month I am continuously facing payment failures...though money is deducting but order isn't placing...and a very bad customer service response asking to uninstall and reinstall the app....silly

This app is a joke. So many technical issues. Cant even add money to my walet. Contacted customer care was told to singout still same issue after clearing cache evem re installed again. I have never seen so many issues with an app in production.

REALLY THIS APP IS WONDERFUL!😊 When I installed it I was not really able to undersatand but when I used it was very easy.this app is very useful during Corona days.we can order as many things as we want..all groceries items r available..we can add or remove things till 11:00 pm at night. we hv to not pay cash thats also nice.Sometimes if the item which I hv ordered is not available they refund our money instantly...this app is too better than grofers or big basket this app does delivery in 1 day

Initially the services very excellent but now services have gone down to zero... Asked call back from escalation it i hope they have huge database of cx hence never bothered to call back... Would not recommend to download the application better to buy from a nearby store if u really want to have good service
I am not able to open the Supr Daily app since yesterday, even after updating the app, still it's not working. Can you please help me with this issue.
This App helps people. service levels are also Good. Short and simple app gives clear information about the current available goods. Keep up the good service that is all what I can say.
Awesome app.. the interface is nice. Very user friendly app for all age group. Delivery is on time. Instant customer support. Would surely recommend to everyone to use it. Good work guys.

Its the best app ever. The customer service is so helpful and supportive. They will help you in any problem you face. You can fully trust and place order. You don't have to worry about undelivered products as they will refund and if not customer support will help in best way. I had the best experience with the app. Even in such difficult times of lockdown this app is providing as many products as possible and you can also request for it. Overall great app.

I loved this app especially in locked time also they provided on time delivery. Vegetables and fruits are very fresh. Rates are abit more but I still prefer to ordr through this app only due to freshness in veg n fruits and on time delivery.

I used this app around 6 to 7 month, Just stopped during lockdown. Now I am decreasing my feedback from 5 to 2. They introduced delivery charges ~2 rs per litre and grocery delivery 20/- each time, okay take it but inform to user before deducting it. I wanted to re-start gradually because of society issue about outsiders so just ordered on daily basis in old way. They deducted 26/- from wallet, which I came to know after ordering things..Will I get dream that you started charging the things.

This app is only good for buying milk, nothing else can be ordered, rotten vegetables are delivered. Sometimes even certain orders are not even delivered. Customer care support is also not satisfactory. It needs to improve a lot. However it is useful for ordering milk

The worst app ever used. I trusted and installed it thrice and was disappointed everytime. All this app team cares for is money. Worst delivery, expired/not consumable products and lying customer care. This review is to remind me not to ever install it again.
Used to be good. Haven't been able to scale. Quality of products has gone down over time. Much higher frequency of damaged products. And the chat "support" is a nightmare. 👎

It's been more than 3 months since delivery of essential commodities are ceased. My account is automatically updated to Vacation mode. Even after the lockdown was relaxed the services never resumed. Some of the delivery charges debited erroneously are not returned yet. Customer service not responding properly.

Great app to get your daily needs on time......when you get up in morning all things are at ur doorstep.....no worries about to rush every morning. Found it very good in terms of if item not get delivered they return your money honestly. Your complaint is getting addressed every time. Thnx supr daily....

Only Few vegetable item are Available in app in Chennai and mushrooms, brinjal etc, like few items are not available in app itself. App is too slow. Getting notifications of availability of item marked 'Notify', if you rush to order you will be disappointed. It will be again OOS.

The only app that showed my location as deliverable, no warnings or feasibility check. Order placed and paid, but then I get a WhatsApp message that product can't be delivered, order canceled automatically and money refunded to 'wallet'. Money in lockdown, in the month end, stuck in wallet of an app which won't deliver anything to my address. And upon making the support executive understand for half an hour, I'm assured that money will be reversed to my bank account in 7-9 days. Just outrageous.

very bad while buying vegetables and fruits. I have been closely monitoring the weight of the vegetables I order from supr daily and bbdaily. I always found that weight of vegetables in supr daily is somewhat less than you ordered. moreover the vegetables and fruits are way too costly than bbdaily and local kirana store, which doubles the impact. Totally disappointing, will switch to bbdaily as soon as my all subscription ends.

Very very very bad experience with this app. Don't ever order from this app. 1. They don't deliver orders on time and without informing customer cancel orders. 2. Money gets stuck in their wallet and they don't transfer the money in bank also. 3. Even their customer care agents also not helping in solving issue and they access your app without your consent and put your orders on hold by automatically switching on vacation mode. Please dnt ever use this app

I am happy with the hassle free delivery service and always on time. Reduced rating to 3 stars because being a regular buyer, I expect discount coupons from SuprDaily. Haven't received ever even one coupon till now whereas there are coupons visible on the internet. While applying them it shows that I cannot apply it and these coupons are for selective customers. It makes a feel of undefined differentiation made by SuprDaily.

I have using this app from December for milk and now during the coronavirus nationwide lockdown. I m using it and I m getting everything by 9:00 am. And I can see many have given bad rating but If they are taking delivery fee but at same you can use Supr Access during lockdown we are comfortable sitting at home and getting things at our home so such small amount we can pay because this amount is not equal to the life of delivery executive.

Only app which delivers essentials to my area where big basket is delivering only to gated communities. There seems to be very basic items available but batter prices are sold at mrp whereas in local shops we can procure 10 to 15 rupees cheap. So use it mainly when u can't go out and buy.
I am trying to sign in from last 3 days, but not able to receive OTP, so not able to sign in. Called customer care as well but yet no resolution provided. Seems no other option but to uninstall it.
Awesome app for daily needs.. Great experience turns to bad experience.. I'm facing the same issue from last 7days and no one is there to look into this.

The experience went so well for nearly 6 months. Milk packets were delivered on time and placed neatly in the SUPR insulated bags. Ironically after introducing the service fee my milk packets were lying on the road and tried reaching the customer care multiple times for help which is of no use. They service has become worse these days since,May2020. 10-Jun20: As suggested by you have sent an e-mail fine my query and still been waiting for your response.
Great App and service. Delivery on time the very next day. One wakes up to find the right items outside the door. Given 4 stars because few items are always unavailable.

Worst app , never shows the items in stocks when u browse without clicking individual item , and when u start clicking items , 90% of items are not in stock(worst designed product), from the remaining 10% u order they tend to cancel half the products , basically this just milk and egg app , with some expensive fruit option
High quality service without any errors even during lockdown period. Regular updates given during peak of lockdown and cust satisfaction ensured.

Best efforts by super daily...even at the lockdown situation, They r delivering their daily needs product very loyally,much Much Better service then big brand companies like Amazon Pentry & Big Basket..delivery on time Without Delivery charges that's Appreciable...!👏👏👏🙌🙌just a suggestion improve app speed,Location checking, Product availablity&Broadcast Your ads in Tv,Then you're superstar ! Urgently Change Your Strategy:People Buying Tatra Milks From Local Stores/medicals,No extra Charge!
The app is not opening at all, getting "something went wrong" message reinstalled the app no go works first time then errors out with the message.
App is good no complaint. One star rating is due to the fact don't expect a quality service the moment you start to experience any issue with the service.

Well app is good and service is good. However it has became Supr expensive as well. Subscription delivery charge became twice & grocery del chrg is sky rockted in name of covid crisis. They are also pushing for their supr access program. Not useful anymore.

There is real issue with their processing and management, first of all they don't show whether item is available or not on the app, once you click on add then they show its out of stock, just remove items which are not available. After spending so much time on app they will simply cancel your order next morning with message, it happened with me 3 times, they will refund your item charges but you have to follow up for your delivery charges. So overall experience is bad, won't recommend this app
Lots of Bug in App.....poor user experience For solution support team have only one solution that is logout and login again ? What is this ??
Started using this app for milk delivery. So far my experience has been good. Delivery is prompt. I will definitely recommend this app to all my friends.

Earlier it used to be a good app I was very satisfied. But now after the new updates it becomes worst. I placed order continuously for two days, order was accepted & on the next day (delivery day), they will drop a message that we are unable to deliver your order & refund the money into the wallet. I just want to say if you can't deliver then why to display those products in the app and keep us in hope until the next day. You are just wasting our time by taking an order & not delivering it.
Very helpful at this time when we don't want to go out.Through super access it's easy to order daily needs easily.
This a great app. On-time delivery every time. SuprHappy to use this app.

"simply superb service"(this was my old compliment but now this app is goin worse day by day,in starting customer care and team was very helpful but now they are getting rude day by day,app has issues of auto change of slot when u r placing an order ,so m changing review from 5 star to 1)

Idea & service was good in initial time, but app doesn't really track delivery is actually happen or not. It works on assumption. No co-relation between app and actual delivery. I always get patent answer " you will get call in 24hrs, we highlighted issue" but didn't receive once in 15 days. It is not only about money, but pathetic experience. Need lot of improvement.

Nice app. Delivery and customer service good. I knew that they are charging money for delivery. I took supr pass.. Really helped me.. During covid timing, they operated that's most thing we have to remember.. Kudos to the efforts.
Extra charges imposed on product even though subscription took at the period of super access membership.improve the scenario of deducting money from wallet without any notification

I find this app very confusing and misleading. Especially the payment part, when you have already added money to wallet to subscribe milk and you want add some groceries item again, it again asks to pay the full subscription fee which is already showing in wallet. Also the supr credit redemption part is very confusing and the information provided does not works as advised here.
I've been using this for getting milk delivered since some time now. Everything has been super smooth so far. I'm happy with the app! 👍
The app is down for past few days. It just shows loading, but nothing happens after that.

Very good app. Got delivery before 7am. During lockdown it was very helpful since bb wasn't available but supr daily was available. Everynight i will order be it groceries or vegetable or milk and will get before 7am. Subscription idea is good.

you have managed to screw up my very first order. Items are missing and I have tried calling your non existent customer care number. I have also tried to chat but apparently no executives available for 30 mins. How this app has survived is beyond me. Edit: I have sent my details twice. Once through the app and in twitter. Edit 2- They screwed up the order 2 DAYS IN A ROW!! After they called me and promised nothing like this would happen. Edit 3- Every week they keep missing items from my list.
It's a good application only the thing I don't like is that you are charging service fee now it wasn't before.
The experience so far is really very good. During this difficult times the ordered products delivered on time and Quality.
Happy with the service but the quality of vegetables and fruits need to be improved. No issues with packaged products
Best app for daily needs .On time delivery hassle free payment .I would have given 5* but they don't have any reward program for regular customer to earn some coupon .
More numerous products should be introduced. Also app is bit slow. Need to speed up.
Can't even login the application. It is showing Invalid user Id even though it is a valid one . I hope supr Daily fixes this issue.

The app is really a pain to use. It takes a hell lot of time to open. The refresh icon on the top left on the chat with executive page doesn't refresh the chat, it restarts it, and you end up at "Hi again" from the bot. The notification for the message from executive doesn't open when you click on open on the notification, it opens the app, basically, there's no way of going back to the same conversation once you're out. Stupid. Disappointing. Terrible.

I have been using this app since it was launched in Pune. I honestly think that intial app UI was much better than new UI. Not only the new version is bit confusing to use but also it doesnt run smoothly. Many times you have to kill it to set or cancel vacations,create new order etc
Good service but some items shown in the list are not available.if they are not available do not show them in the list.

For milk deliverables it's perfect app, while for other groceries and vegetables not all listed in the app are available many a times. Can improve! I will still rate 5 for their good customer care and on time deliverables.

Before covid-19 it was a 5 star app and I advised this app to many people as I was very happy with its services, but now they are charging 2rs per litre delivery charge on milk and 20 rs service fee on all the other items once I wanted a curd packet of 10/- but on checking out total amount to pay was 30/- like seriously??? Who will pay this much service amount ?? So I will be bidding adieu very soon
Your app has started spamming notification. It was 3 per day initially now it's 6, had to turn off the entire notification settings on your app

They are horrible with their service and the quality of products they deliver. In all the time I've been using the app, I've just been raising issues and complaints for bad quality products and now I'm just tired. Be warned, they will have provided great service for the first 3 months to get you to believe they are good. Then show their true service with bad products and even worse customer service

Thanks supr daily team, for the quick reply. I have now updated my rating :) App UX is much better now. I would like to suggest one more thing. Can you please update the scheduling feature. It's very basic as of now. I cannot subscribe for every alternate day or after every two days, or once a week, etc. I hope you get my point and consider this in your next update. Thanks

Probably one of the worst daily essentials subscription app. Been following up since a month for a item for which I was charged double the amount and no response. Cant use the money in wallet as it says item not available in my area all the time(though it's available without any issues with other vendors). Absolute disaster app and loss of money. Pls dont use the app.

Nice app, easy to operate.Delivery is on time. Orders can be scheduled for delivery at a later date. Currently not all items are available , but the available products are of good quality. There is also a section which shows what is currently available for ordering. Orders for undelivered/ undeliverable items are cancelled and money is refunded into the Supr Wallet. Customer Service is also responsive. You can also send requests for items that you want to be made available.

This app deserves 0 rating. Below is my experience 1. 1st order, few items were damaged 2. 2d order, few items damage 3. 3rd order also few items damaged 4. 4th time items it self missing Earlier it used to be free delivery without any minimum purchase. Recently they changed it to subscription model where you need to buy a free delivery subscription otherwise for each order you have to pay RS 20. Here is the interesting part, if you are not subscribed to "free delivery", they will deliberately miss 1 or 2 items from your orders, so that you will order again by paying extra RS 20. Cheap business tactics. All i can say is don't use this app for any need
Good easy and practical exp. Good response and accurate services. Commendable during this lockdown times.
Great app for daily needs. There service has been exceptional and they are providing quality services even during coronavirus lockdown
Good experience, but availability of required items is the major issue.

I reinstalled after a long time. I subscribed during the national lockdown so that I need not go outside. Now suddenly you've set my account automatically to vacation mode. It's been on vacation mode for weeks now, I feel stupid for reinstalling the app. I can't even get my money back. Milk is an essential commodity, why can't you deliver it when other apps are doing it?

Have been using this app since Dec'19. Was really good and recommended to many. However, you recently started charging high Service Fee, which is really disappointing. You say that your current operational cost has increased due to covid crises. Then I beleive this service fee should be temporary for a month or 2. If you gonna keep it permanent then please refund me the balance from my Supr Wallet. I don't see a method how to unload the wallet.

It used to be good app, been using since more than 8 month but now due to covid-19 lock down everything just became too costly. Rs 2 being charged for a litre of milk delivery. This means if you are subscribed to a litre of milk daily, you will pay Rs 60 extra each month. I am going to close the subscription, once my wallet is exhausted. There are many other agencies that do delivery without any charges such as bb daily.

Onw time one of the best app but no longer. The worst part is, it show lots of item but when you go to select the item, it say, unavailable due to high demand. At first place why you are showing items if its not available with you. Very frustrating and time wasted with app. Item should show only when its available for my purchas else not. Atleast I will not waste my time.

Total worthless and useless application. The service is not regular, at the last moment when you call the customer service they will say that sorry we can't deliver so take your money. Even the number will be switched off most of the time. No difference if you buy supr access or normal they will talk unnecessary gossip but never ever accept their mistakes. By believing them I added 1000 rupees but that seems went in vein.

Mind it when you transfer money into the wallet. You may not be able to transfer back your money from wallet to source account. The customer support agent, at first, doesn't respond until more than hour. Then they suddenly reply and close the conversation since the customer is not available to converse. And lo!! ... The customer has to start from scratch to put in his woes

Initially it was a very good and helpful app. But now almost everything is unavailable on the app. Why does it show something which is unavailable. Only those items should be posted which are available . Have to scan through 100's of items only to understand only two items are avialable. It is so frustrating and a total waste of time .

Always ready to create issues to customers who have taken subscription and have to wait like a farmer waiting for rain. Not a trust worthy app. If you want to waste your money please take subscription and wait. We get all the messages about groceries getting delivered and they're not ready to do so. One of the worst support team I have ever interacted. False promises to the customers and play with the amount paid. No proper response will be given when you've a doubt and they try to just skip it.

This app needs to be updated with the list of items that are in stock not just display all the items , even after having a subscription what is the use if items are not available and they refund you the money in SuprWallet due to last minute cancellations and you can't buy anything else as the items are out of stock almost all the time .

Initially It started with Customer friendly Service with good discount and Offers, It was still ok till they delivered milk and other subscription free of cost, Now taking advantage of Corona Pandemic they started charging extra charges per packet and deliveries, Now it looks like it will be regularised and we have to pay for all deliveries henceforth. Not good

I started with the subscription one month back, in the initial days it was good, i was quite impressed with the app, but now it has got horrible, firstly the out of stock thing, not a single product is available except subscription, and secondly the Delivery charges are very high, on retail products we can understand but for subscription also you people are charging per packet , it's better we buy milk from local shops. Highly disappointed.

I am a regular user of this app since long and was buying regularly. I liked this app and also suggested to many but unfortunately after the lockdown the app shows all the product but most of them are out of stock. They have recently added delivery charges which are too high, one packet is charged Rs. 20. If I order goods value of Rs. 20 I have to pay extra Rs. 20 to get it delivered. Is this a kind of black marketing? Taking the benefit out of such a terrible situation. I will quit once my

This was a good app for a while - everything was perfect,deliveries on time,all ordered item delivered. But of late,since the lockdown began, SuprDaily has become increasingly unreliable & expensive. Availability of items is a big issue, prompt delivery of ordered items is a bigger issue & the biggest issue of all is the fact that they are charging a delivery fee: ₹2 per litre of milk & ₹20 per delivery!! Are you kidding me? Just not worth using the app anymore unless they rollback these charges

Not able to open the app. Dear SuprDaily Team, Thank you for your support in lockdown. After recent app update, the app gets stuck into blank white screen. So reinstalled the app and restarted my phone also tried to clear the cache and data from settings. But still the problem persists. Please help me to resolve the issue asap.

This app might be helpful for others but for me it was a pain. I have taken subscription frm 30/3/2020 and till the date I'm giving the feedback, I didn't receive a single delivery. Their Customer Support team is very humble, they will simply say, sorry for the inconvenience it won't happen again. This is the sentence they are repeating from day one. Thanks super daily for wasting my time. And I will request you to donate my subscription amount to PM health care. I am done with this App.🙏

App is excellent, works well, the service is also fine, information communication during delays is also fine, the problem is the free delivery, they charge for delivery and give cashback in supr credits, just another vicious cycle to bind consumers, I am going to ditch it once my subscription ends, also request others to not try it on the first place and fall for the trap, already enough traps are there, don't need anymore

I am not completely satisfied with the app because they have recently started "supr access" where you can order anything without taking subscription and without having to pay service fee. I took supr access for one month but that is useless for me because everyday in the morning when i go to order groceries for the next day it shows out of stock. Everything is out of stock on the app then what is the use of taking supr access? I won't suggest anyone to take "supr access".

So thankful to uhh people🙏🙏❤️❤️. The things u have to improve now is mainly pricing ( with more discount in vegetables ,as they are little costly than some other place)...nd you should add more variety of products across the brand's. May be in next update you can give a toolbox acoording to nutrition and vitamin. Customer just have to click the nutrition he wants, and then finally he will be able to see all range of products containing that vitamin richly. In COVId-19 time...this is need.

The service was good till now. Now the app is automatically adding membership fee which i do not need and it is not clearing from the cart. So because of this my money is stuck in supr wallet and i cannot order anything. Is this some kind of fraud?

It was good before but now they are charging for subscription at a stupendous cost. Better to stay away from the app. They are charging delivery fees if no subscription is taken which is again very costly.
